column1: authors:  Allen J. Beck, Ph.D. and Christopher J. Mumola
Table 13.  Number of sentenced Hispanic prisoners
under State or Federal jurisdiction, by gender, 1990, 1995 -97
Note: Sentenced prisoners are those with a sentence of more than 1 year.  The
total number of Hispanic inmates was estimated in each year by multiplying
the percent identifying as Hispanic in the 1991 and 1997 surveys by the NPS
sentenced inmate counts.  Estimates have been rounded to the nearest 100.
